Text.Page:
Urgent Order

, Virienne has sent us a warning. Please come to the Federation Reliquary Station as soon as you can.

â€” Dougal

[You must have equipment level 473 or higher to enter the Corrupted Skynest.]
After Virienne discovered Kelsaik's body was gone, the federation found a hidden Argon base.

Thank you for coming .

Please take a look at Virienne's warning. I really don't know what to make of it myself.

Since you know the details now, I won't waste any more time.

We need to investigate that Energy Transfer Post as soon as possible.

Jelena is in that area now, so I want you to go there and give her a hand. Also, check in with Nailon at the Verrak Fountain Fishery. That popori always has his eyes and ears open.

Hello! You've definitley got that "Dougal asked me to do something I don't understand" look, am I right?

I knew it! Everything around here is weird. but a couple days ago I saw some particularly weird light coming from that island up there. I told that Jelena lady about it, and she couldn't get out of here fast enough!

So if you're looking for answers, you should probably get up there yourself.

, of course. Who else would they send after me, with Elleon gone.

I'll get straight to the point. This structure is generating a lot of energy, and channeling it through this teleportal. I took a quick peek inside and saw some argons, but I'm not sure they're the real story here.

Can you keep an eye on things for me while I scout the other platforms?

If you decide to engage them, don't forget to call for back up.

Report back to Dougal when you're done.
Good luck.

Looks like Virienne was right. The argons and the Azart Army attempted to resurrect Kelsaik.

We need a more permanant solution to this alliance of evil. But for now, I'll have Jelena keep investigating.

Good work, .
